qas.question: What is the name of the headscarf worn by married women?
What is the name of the shawl that married women wear on their upper bodies?
Along with abaya, what is a traditional Arab garment sometimes worn by Somali women?

context: Married women tend to sport headscarves referred to as <a0_0>shaash<a0_0/>. They also often cover their upper body with a shawl, which is known as <a1_0>garbasaar<a1_0/>. Unmarried or young women, however, do not always cover their heads. Traditional Arabian garb, such as <a2_0>the jilbab<a2_0/> and abaya, is also commonly worn.
